query: SELECT uc.id, uc.username, uc.password_changed_at, uc.must_change_password, u.name, u.email FROM user_credentials uc JOIN users u ON uc.user_id = u.id WHERE uc.username IN ('karen.trindade', 'leticia.uzeika');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute SELECT uc.id, uc.username, uc.password_changed_at, uc.must_change_password, u.name, u.email FROM user_credentials uc JOIN users u ON uc.user_id = u.id WHERE uc.username IN ('karen.trindade', 'leticia.uzeika');
